items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: magnificent drive on the up to split cover and mid-off, shot of the <s> morning. </s> Afternoon, I should say
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs
Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.preText: Bhavin Shah: "How fit Gayle is looking ? Playing for KXIP in IPL have a big impact on his Fitness. He was the one who looks to score in boundaries, but now going for singles." -- Seems it has been a conscious decision to make up for his watchfulness. Looks fit but has always had a dodgy back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: backs away, bowler follows him. Bunted to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: squirts this into the off side.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: big appeal and gone. Gayle looks for the sweep - something he doesn't often play - but this one just does him for pace as this skids through. Gayle is also overbalanced and falls over, loses control as the bottom hand comes off the grip. No doubt whatsoever that this would've crashed into the stumps. Mehidy is pumped, why not.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, OUT

dismissal.text: CH Gayle lbw b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 29 (38b 3x4 1x6) SR: 76.31

items.preText: Shimron Hetmyer is the new man in
items.text: defends with the bat well in front of the pad.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: chops this attempted punch to cover.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, no run
Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: shows the full face of the bat as he defends.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.preText: Phani: "I am a big fan of Hetmyer. In whatever little opportunities he got, he has shown that spark which says he could be WI batting mainstay for years to come. What do you think so Shashank?" -- Stylish, got drives to die for. Needs to show the consistency now. Also watch out for these kids Alick Athanaze and Kirstan Kallicharan. Very impressive.
items.text: flicked uppishly, on the bounce to deep midwicket.
